function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity increases the likelihood of disease transmission, especially in shared dwellings and apartment housing.","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19 and other contagious diseases, leading to negative health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Enforce physical distancing of at least two meters, increase ventilation, and promote frequent handwashing.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems and air purifiers to improve indoor air quality.","People":"Residents of shared dwellings and apartment housing.","Owner":"Building management, landlords, and government authorities."},{"Description":"Mental and physical health issues due to poor living conditions and lack of physical distancing within shared dwellings.","Impact":"Negative impact on the well-being and health of residents, leading to increased stress and illness.","Mitigation":"Improve living conditions, provide mental health support, and promote physical distancing measures within shared dwellings.","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote healthcare support, online mental health resources.","People":"Residents of shared dwellings and apartment housing.","Owner":"Building management, landlords, and government authorities."},{"Description":"Increased risk of surface transmission within apartment buildings due to high-touch surfaces and communal spaces.","Impact":"Higher risk of surface transmission of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases, leading to potential outbreaks within buildings.","Mitigation":"Increased cleaning and disinfection of high-touch surfaces, closure of communal spaces, and promotion of hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Touchless entry systems, UV-C disinfection devices for common areas.","People":"Residents of apartment housing and building visitors.","Owner":"Building management, landlords, and government authorities."}]}
